Interface LocatedDeviceListener

All Superinterfaces:
IcasaListener
All Known Subinterfaces:
MultiEventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
EmptyLocatedDeviceListener
public interface LocatedDeviceListener
extends IcasaListener

Listener on LocatedDevice objects

Author:
Gabriel Pedraza Ferreira
